## Understanding your code

One of the most frustrating things when writing code is not understanding anything you have written when you come back to it after a pause.
It is crucial to comment code to help your future self, as well as others, to read the code. Your future self would also benefit from an overview of the code, particularly
to find how you have subset the data. For this purpose I use codeBender

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:
